Package simplenlg.test

Class Summary
AdjectivePhraseTest This class incorporates a few tests for adjectival phrases.
ClauseAggregationTest Some tests for aggregation.
ClauseTest The Class STest.
ExternalTest Tests from third parties
FPTest Test added to break the realiser
InterrogativeTest JUnit test case for interrogatives.
MultipleLexiconTest
NIHDBLexiconTest Tests for NIHDBLexicon
NounPhraseTest Tests for the NPPhraseSpec and CoordinateNPPhraseSpec classes.
PhraseSpecTest test suite for simple XXXPhraseSpec classes
PrepositionalPhraseTest This class groups together some tests for prepositional phrases and coordinate prepositional phrases.
SharedLexiconTests
SimpleNLG4Test This class is the base class for all JUnit simplenlg.test cases for simplenlg.
StandAloneExample
SyntaxTests Suite containing all tests for syntax and inflection
TextSpecTest Tests for the TextSpec class.
VerbPhraseTest These are tests for the verb phrase and coordinate VP classes.
XMLLexiconTest
